name: Desperate Conflicts
description:
Desperate Conflicts is a fast-paced real-time strategy game. Your forces call for you within voids of space as you command fleets in an all-out assault of the few remaining resource bases. Command your navy from one of four remaining factions left over from the destruction of the Earth.

This game was a college project between Eliza and Yannick. Eliza did programming, Yannick did art and sound. Both worked on design.

Controls
  • Left click and drag to select units
  • Right click to move or target an enemy
